entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
